markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pack Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5594) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2292), and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid you.
name: Pack Hunter
